attributes.action: Make searching e-Petitions easier by creating a better search system
attributes.additional_details: It currently takes a lot of effort to find e-petitions on this website. Setting up a better search system on this site could make the process a lot easier. No more trawling through petitions to find the right petition, much less duplicate petitions being processed for rejection. The e-petition site would be more likely to be viewed. The petitions would be more likely to be signed by people that care.
